item.title: Evaluating and Aligning CodeLLMs on Human Preference
item.description: CodeArena, a novel benchmark, evaluates code LLMs based on human preferences, revealing performance gaps between open-source and proprietary models, and a large-scale synthetic instruction corpus impr…

item.title: A Simple and Provable Scaling Law for the Test-Time Compute of Large Language Models
item.description: Boost LLM accuracy exponentially by using a two-stage algorithm with provable scaling laws: generate multiple candidate solutions then compare them in a knockout tournament!

item.title: Timestep Embedding Tells: It's Time to Cache for Video Diffusion Model
item.description: TeaCache: a training-free method boosts video diffusion model speed by up to 4.41x with minimal quality loss by cleverly caching intermediate outputs.

item.title: M2rc-Eval: Massively Multilingual Repository-level Code Completion Evaluation
item.description: M2RC-EVAL: A new massively multilingual benchmark for repository-level code completion, featuring fine-grained annotations and a large instruction dataset, enabling better evaluation of code LLMs acro…
